title: The Galil- History, Information and Everything You Need to Know!
snippet: Feb 19, 2012 · Inside of Guatemala the Galil is called a "Kell". By 1994 these "KEL" Galil's where modified back to a Galil SAR configuration and added M203 40MM grenade launchers. In the Latin American Media they actually refer to a KEL as a variant as AR,ARM & SAR. I hope this information is of use to your thread.

title: Seeking Guidance On Adjusting Galil Gas For Suppression
snippet: Jan 19, 2024 · After receiving an Omega 300 from the BOGO, I wanted to try it on my Galil Ace Gen II 7.62x39 with 8.3” barrel. Folks online seemed to really talk up the KNS piston so I installed one of those. The trouble is I can’t seem to find a number of clicks where the gun cycles reliably both suppressed...

title: Need a definitive answer: ok or not to shoot 5.56 through pre-ban Galil?
snippet: Jul 25, 2021 · I've have received equally strong YES and HELL NO to shooting 5.56 out of a Galil. My new to me Galil is an Action Arms pre-ban import circa 1986 or so with a 1-in-12 twist and stamped .223. Jeff Miller of Tenngalil fame says, GO FOR IT, others also knowledgeable say NOPE, could be risky given...

title: KNS precision/adjustable gas piston for Galil? - UZI Talk Forums
snippet: Apr 28, 2021 · Per strong recommendation of Jeff Miller of Hillbilly Firearms, I've swapped-out the original gas piston for my new to me pre-ban AA Galil 386. Piece of cake with just one roll-pin to punch out. I'm looking forward to shooting and adjusting it this weekend. On my first shooting session, as...

title: 308 Galil Barrels AVAILABLE - UZI Talk Forums
snippet: Oct 14, 2025 · Just wanted to put it out there for anyone looking for a 308 Galil barrel. I have a large quantity coming in within the next few weeks- SAR 16" and ARM 20" and potentially 18" as well. These are US made, 41V50 chromoly steel with M25x1.5 receiver threads.
